document_data.name: ''Shrunken Head''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shrunken heads''''' were a type of powerful ''[[spell fetish]]'' used by heroes of the [[Malatran Plateau]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description: The ''fetish'' was a small carved head trinket.
document_data.Powers: The owner of a ''shrunken head fetish'' received limited protection from foul [[necromantic]] [[death magic]]s of the [[headshrinker]]s of the Living Jungle and [[necromancer]]s from beyond the Plateau.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Year of Great Change of the Malatran calendar, a group of heroes from the Living Jungle were tasked by [[Bengoukee]] of the [[Tribe of Big Chief Bagoomba]], on behalf of [[nature spirit (Kara-Tur)|nature spirit]]s, was sent to a faraway land of [[Faer√ªn]] to retrieve an artifact from a dreaded headshrinker. As a reward, Bengoukee gifted one of the heroes with a ''shrunken head'' to protect them from death magic in the future.
